name: [BREATHE]
description:
"AN ALBUM TO BE ENJOYED IN THE COMFORT OF YOUR PYJAMAS COUPLED WITH A HOT CUP OF TEA."

[BREATHE] is a generative artwork application that creates artwork in real-time from an meditative music EP. The application allows you to capture and share your unique generative album artwork while you listen to the music and immerse yourself in a wintery ambience.
(The EP is approximately 20 minutes long in case you were wondering.)

You can share your results via Twitter through the app using the hashtag #breathegenerative

There are also links to Bandcamp, Spotify and iTunes where you can listen to and buy the EP outside of the application.

ENJOY!
